long_description: i offer individual psychotherapy to adults in hamilton, ontario. i am creative in sessions and intuitive, using art, inner imagery, focusing-oriented therapy and hakomi; approaches that engage the client's physicality and imagination. i offer workshops in personal growth, inner inquiry, art and mindfulness. i am available to work with workplaces, agencies and private groups to provide a group experience tailored to fit your needs. counselling clients with hiv and cancer at friends for life society being a big sister supporting new mothers through the pacific postpartum support society. my interest in body-centred work developed in massage therapy school and subsequently through work as an acupressurist.

generated_description: counselling in hamilton is a psychotherapy practice located in hamilton, ontario, founded and operated by stephanie davis, a registered psychotherapist with a master's degree in counselling psychology. since 2004, stephanie davis has provided individual psychotherapy to adults, addressing issues such as depression, anxiety, trauma, addictions, relationship problems, grief, and loss. the practice offers a range of therapeutic approaches, including body-centered and creative therapy, somatic practices, and mindfulness. stephanie davis has extensive experience working with various agencies and has been involved in volunteer work supporting individuals with hiv, cancer, and postpartum depression. she is also trained in internal family systems and hakomi techniques and continues to explore new therapeutic methods, such as theatrical clowning, to enhance her practice.
